text: 2|267|satyavisvasikale, ninnal sampadiccuntakkiya nalla vastukkalil ninnum, bhumiyil ninn ninnalkk nam ulpadippicc tannatil ninnum ninnal celavalikkuvin. kannataccukeantallate ninnal svikarikkatta measamaya sadhanannal (danadharm'mannalil) celavalikkuvanayi karuti vekkarutâ€Œ. allahu aruteyum asrayamillattavanum stutyarhanumanenn ninnal arinnu kealluka
